A

abonnements - Variable in class notification.Server
Stocke les abonnements des utilisateurs sous forme (nom, abonné)
adherer(String, String, String) - Method in class notification.Server
Method which adds a subscription for a new customer identified by his name and according to a modality for the address provided
adresse - Variable in class notification.Subscriber
Private variable containing the address of the subscriber
alerter(String) - Method in class notification.Server
Method which sends the message passed as a parameter to all subscribers according to the method they have chosen.
application - package application
 

C

CommunicationFactory - Class in notification
This class is responsible for instantiating the correct version of the object in charge of a transmission according to a certain modality.
CommunicationFactory() - Constructor for class notification.CommunicationFactory
Constructor without private parameter doing nothing to ensure avoiding instantiation.
CommunicationStrategy - Class in notification
Abstract uper-class (therefore not instantiable) describing the public interface of all communication methods.
CommunicationStrategy() - Constructor for class notification.CommunicationStrategy
 
create(String) - Static method in class notification.CommunicationFactory
decides to creating the correct instance of one of the subclasses of the Communication Strategy class to instanced and to be returned depending on the modality received.

E

envoyer(String, String, String) - Method in class notification.CommunicationStrategy
This method allows to send a message to a client
envoyer(String, String, String) - Method in class notification.MailCommunication
This method allows to send a message with the email address to a client
envoyer(String, String, String) - Method in class notification.SmsCommunication
This method allows to send a message with the phone number to a client

G

getAdresse() - Method in class notification.Subscriber
This method allows to get the address of the subscriber
getListeInscrits() - Method in class notification.Server
Method which returns in the form of an array of channels the list of subscribers according to the format for each string: “NomDuClient (modeChoisi)”
getMode() - Method in class notification.Subscriber
This method allows to get the mode chosen by the subscriber
getNom() - Method in class notification.Subscriber
This method allows to get the name of the subscriber
getStrategy() - Method in class notification.Subscriber
This method allows to get the strategy

M

MailCommunication - Class in notification
Concrete subclass of the abstract CommunicationStrategy class.
MailCommunication() - Constructor for class notification.MailCommunication
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class application.TestServer
Execution of examples of use of the service.
mode - Variable in class notification.Subscriber
Private variable containing the mode chosen by the subscriber

N

nom - Variable in class notification.Subscriber
Private variable containing the name of the subscriber
notification - package notification
 

R

retirer(String) - Method in class notification.Server
Method which withdraws membership from the alert service for the named customer if he is a member, otherwise displays a message of error.

S

Server - Class in notification
 
Server() - Constructor for class notification.Server
Constructeur de Server : initialise la structure de stockage des abonnés
SmsCommunication - Class in notification
Concrete subclass of the abstract CommunicationStrategy class.
SmsCommunication() - Constructor for class notification.SmsCommunication
 
strategy - Variable in class notification.Subscriber
Private variable containing the communication strategy of the subscriber
Subscriber - Class in notification
 
Subscriber(String, String, String, CommunicationStrategy) - Constructor for class notification.Subscriber
Constructor of the class, initializes a subscriber with his name, the mode of communication he has chosen for membership, the address to contact him in the chosen modality and the subject of the correct modality who will be responsible for sending alerts to him.

T

TestServer - Class in application
This class only contains one main demonstrator of correct operation from the alert service.
TestServer() - Constructor for class application.TestServer
